mapper.select: select (to_char(sysdate, 'YYMM')||'-'||(select to_char(doc_type_id, 'FM00') from doc_type where doc_type_id = #{doc_type_id})||to_char(seq_doc_id.nextval, 'FM0000')) from dual

select D.DOC_ID,D.DOC_DATE,D.DOC_CONTENT,e.dep_id,D.EMP_ID from Document d,employee e,RECEIVE_LIST r where e.DEP_ID = r.dep_id and e.emp_id = d.emp_id and r.doc_id = d.doc_id order by d.DOC_DATE DESC;
